pages.text: $(item)Symbols$(1) are a method of communicating one's intention to a higher power. By forming the metals into distinctive shapes, one can invoke the gods and have them do your bidding. $(0)$(br2)$(o)You can see what I'm working with here... Let me summarize. $(br2)$(#9d1e2d)Acid$(0) is the reagent for each of these transmutations.
$(o)A $(item)Copper Symbol$(0) will promote the movement of Power to or from a nearby Crucible.
$(o)An $(item)Iron Symbol$(0) will restrict the movement of Power.
$(o)A $(item)Gold Symbol$(0) will bring about the expression of Power in certain reactions.

$(o)The mechanics that cause these symbols to behave in these manners is unknown, but seems related to metallurgy. Copper promotes change, Iron promotes stability, Gold promotes radiance. Claiming a spiritual influence is at work seems reckless at best.
